mapper.select: SELECT E.EMPL_ID AS DCLZ_EMPL_ID, E.EMPL_NM, (SELECT C.COMMON_NAME FROM COMMON C WHERE C.COMMON_CODE = E.COMMON_CODE_DEPT) AS DEPT_NM, (SELECT C.COMMON_NAME FROM COMMON C WHERE C.COMMON_CODE = E.COMMON_CODE_CLSF) AS CLSF_NM, COALESCE(MAX(D.DCLZ_WIK_WORK_TIME), 0) AS DCLZ_WIK_WORK_TIME, COALESCE(COUNT( CASE WHEN D.COMMON_CODE_LABOR_STTUS != 'LABOR_STTUS015' THEN D.DCLZ_WORK_DE ELSE NULL END) , 0) AS REAL_WIK_WORK_DATE FROM EMPL E LEFT JOIN DCLZ D ON D.DCLZ_EMPL_ID = E.EMPL_ID AND D.DCLZ_WORK_WIK = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'IYYY-IW') WHERE NOT E.COMMON_CODE_DEPT = 'DEPT015' AND NOT E.COMMON_CODE_CLSF = 'CLSF010' GROUP BY E.EMPL_ID, E.EMPL_NM, E.COMMON_CODE_DEPT, E.COMMON_CODE_CLSF

SELECT E.EMPL_ID AS DCLZ_EMPL_ID, E.EMPL_NM, (SELECT C.COMMON_NAME FROM COMMON C WHERE C.COMMON_CODE = E.COMMON_CODE_DEPT) AS DEPT_NM, (SELECT C.COMMON_NAME FROM COMMON C WHERE C.COMMON_CODE = E.COMMON_CODE_CLSF) AS CLSF_NM, COALESCE(MAX(D.DCLZ_WIK_WORK_TIME), 0) AS DCLZ_WIK_WORK_TIME, COALESCE(COUNT( CASE WHEN D.COMMON_CODE_LABOR_STTUS != 'LABOR_STTUS015' THEN D.DCLZ_WORK_DE ELSE NULL END) , 0) AS REAL_WIK_WORK_DATE FROM EMPL E LEFT JOIN DCLZ D ON D.DCLZ_EMPL_ID = E.EMPL_ID AND D.DCLZ_WORK_WIK = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'IYYY-IW') WHERE E.COMMON_CODE_DEPT = #{deptCode} GROUP BY E.EMPL_ID, E.EMPL_NM, E.COMMON_CODE_DEPT, E.COMMON_CODE_CLSF
SELECT COMMON_CODE AS DEPT_CODE FROM COMMON WHERE COMMON_PARENT_CODE = 'DEPT01' AND COMMON_SECTION_VALUE != 'CEO'

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(D.DCLZ_DAIL_WORK_TIME) / 60, 0) AS DEPT_TOTAL_WORK_TIME FROM EMPL E JOIN DCLZ D ON E.EMPL_ID = D.DCLZ_EMPL_ID WHERE D.DCLZ_WORK_WIK = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'IYYY-IW') AND E.COMMON_CODE_DEPT = #{deptCode}

SELECT COALESCE(AVG(D.DCLZ_DAIL_WORK_TIME) / 60, 0) AS DEPT_AVG_WORK_TIME FROM EMPL E JOIN DCLZ D ON E.EMPL_ID = D.DCLZ_EMPL_ID WHERE D.DCLZ_WORK_WIK = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'IYYY-IW') AND E.COMMON_CODE_DEPT = #{deptCode}
